weekly_top_story.headline: COP30 Advances Climate Justice with Loss and Damage Fund Proposals
weekly_top_story.summary: At the UN climate summit in Belém, Brazil, delegates launched new proposals for a Loss and Damage Fund to support vulnerable countries, marking a major step toward climate justice and global cooperation.

stories.headline: U.S. Military Buildup Near Venezuela Raises Tensions
stories.summary: The United States has amassed naval forces in the Caribbean, sparking fears of a potential larger conflict with Venezuela amid ongoing diplomatic and drug-related tensions.

stories.headline: Ukraine Seeks New Gas Supply Amid Ongoing Russian Attacks
stories.summary: Ukrainian President Zelenskyy is negotiating a new gas supply deal with Greece as Russia continues its attacks on energy infrastructure, highlighting the ongoing energy crisis and security challenges.

stories.headline: Gen Z Protests Spread to Mexico Against Violence and Corruption
stories.summary: Protests led by young people in Mexico City against violence and corruption have escalated, reflecting a growing youth movement demanding accountability and change.
